work.summary: Research in computational ecology and environmental modelling

work.name: Josip Juraj Strossmayer University of Osijek, Department of Biology
work.summary: Worked on a number of research projects; DEB modeling, climate change impact assessment on insect populations, high performance computing in ecology

education.institution: Faculty of Science, Department of Biology, University of Zagreb
education.summary: Thesis: Innovative designs of ecological experiments in silico based on artificial intelligence. Research area: Computational biology and ecology. Advisors: Sunčana Geček, prof. Perica Mustafić

education.institution: Josip Juraj Strossmayer University of Osijek, Department of Biology

projects.name: CADAPT: Adaptation of mosquito population control measures to climate change in Croatia
projects.description: A project focused on adapting mosquito control strategies to the impacts of climate change in Croatia. The project aims to develop innovative approaches to manage mosquito populations in the face of changing environment
